snippet.title: Reheat - The Rescue - Gameplay Cuts
snippet.description:
Play it for free in your browser!
https://slidergames.itch.io/reheat-the-rescue

Go on a journey to rescue your father and master Heat Flow in this simple chess-like game.

Reheat - The Rescue is a short educational game that teaches about heat flow. Made originally for the Legends of Learning educational games platform.

________________

Social and other links: https://linktr.ee/slidergameshq
